description: A small, imp-like girl who is constantly seen with http://anidb.net/ch3770 [Gasu]. She is shown to care for him deeply and treats him with the utmost respect and trust, crying out in fear when he is hurt. http://anidb.net/ch3770 [Gasu] also seems to care for Iryita, diving into space to catch her when she is falling. Her personality is mischievous and spunky.
name: Iryita
